name: Clay Match
description:
Clay match is a short, but  also endless  in many ways arena game, where you face other clay constructs in surreal environment. Try to gather the most clay you can, while facing different settings. While you gain more speed, you will start with less health. If you get more damage, you may suffer a loss of dodging ability. It's all up to clay entity, to bestow different traits to your own clay man!

You can press "T" while playing to display tutorial :)
